original_text: When you let him go, you must not send him away with nothing to take with him.
korean_text: 그를 놓아 자유하게 할 때에는 빈 손으로 가게 하지 말고

sentences.original_text: you must not send him away
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그를 빈손으로 보내지 말아야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: with nothing to take with him
